H0.text: What was the forename of the composer of the 'Bolero', which featured in the film '10' starring Bo Derek and Dudley Moore. Maurice

H1.text: What was the forename of the composer of the 'Bolero', which featured in the film '10' starring Bo Derek and Dudley Moore. Erik

H2.text: What was the forename of the composer of the 'Bolero', which featured in the film '10' starring Bo Derek and Dudley Moore. Claude

H3.text: What was the forename of the composer of the 'Bolero', which featured in the film '10' starring Bo Derek and Dudley Moore. Ravel

A4.text: The last composition Ravel completed in the 1920s, Boléro, became his most famous.

A5.text: Ravel commented to Arthur Honegger, one of Les Six, 'I've written only one masterpiece – Boléro.'
